comment: /**  * Create the {@link InvocableHandlerMethod} that is able to process the specified  * method endpoint.  * @param bean the bean instance  * @param method the method to invoke  * @return an {@link InvocableHandlerMethod} suitable for that method  */
code: /**  * Create the {@link InvocableHandlerMethod} that is able to process the specified  * method endpoint.  * @param bean the bean instance  * @param method the method to invoke  * @return an {@link InvocableHandlerMethod} suitable for that method  */ InvocableHandlerMethod createInvocableHandlerMethod(Object bean, Method method).
